content.text: Match ends, Almería 1, Espanyol 1.
Second Half ends, Almería 1, Espanyol 1.
Goal!  Almería 1, Espanyol 1. Sergio García (Espanyol) left footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Víctor Sánchez.
Sebastián Dubarbier (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Cristhian Stuani (Espanyol).
Substitution, Almería. Corona replaces Edgar Méndez.
